text:
Gordon Hillman (29 July 1943 – 1 July 2018) was a British archaeobotanist. He worked as Professor in Archaeobotany (Palaeoethnobotany) at the Institute of Archaeology, University College London.
He was awarded the Distinguished Economic Botanist award by the Society for Economic Botany in 2004.
Hillman died on 1 July 2018 in London of complications from Parkinson's disease, aged 74.
